views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11

This tweak will let you navigate to the respective settings for the Control Center Module by using Gestures!

Compatible with all devices running iOS11. For non 3d touch devices, it is recommended to use the Swipe Left/Right Gesture as the long press gesture will interfere with the stock gesture to expand the modules.

Features :
Select custom Gestures (Long Press/Left Swipe/Right Swipe)
Select custom Music App for the music widget
Supported Third Party Toggles
NoctisXI
CCVPN
LocationServices

Most of the stock toggles supported!

Supports BetterCCXI

Configure options from Settings.
Fixed connectivity toggles not working if the locale is not English.
